articles.title: Salesforce lays off 4,000 workers as AI agents replace customer support jobs
articles.summary: Salesforce CEO is laying off 4,000 customer support jobs and replacing them with AI. Marc Benioff says Salesforce‚Äôs AI system now handles half of all support interactions, cutting costs by 17% and eliminating thousands of roles. articles.title: XAI CFO Mike Liberatore Leaves Three Months After Taking Job
articles.summary: XAI Chief Financial Officer Mike Liberatore has left the company just a few months after taking the job, according to people familiar with the matter, creating a high-profile vacancy at Elon Musk‚Äôs artificial intelligence startup.

articles.title: Salesforce's weak quarterly revenue forecast signals lagging AI monetization
articles.summary: Salesforce forecast third-quarter revenue below Wall Street estimates on Wednesday, signaling lagging monetization for its highly-touted artificial intelligence agent platform as clients dial back spending due to macroeconomic uncertainty.
